name: KN Mobile ShareBar
author: Freddie Aziz Jasbindar

sections.description:
How it works?

  • Displays a floating share bar with custom shared text on Facebook, Twitter and WhatsApp at bottom or top of your website via mobile.

Available Post-Types

  • Front page
  • Single post
  • All Pages

Demo – please view any article from this website with mobile

  • My blog – www.orangperak.com
sections.installation:
Installation

  1. Upload the kn-mobile-sharebar folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the KN Mobile ShareBar plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Change KN Mobile Sharebar settings in admin panel and then continue view your site via mobile!

Updating

If you had a trouble in updating this plugin, try deactive old version and delete the folder kn-mobile-sharebar from the /wp-content/plugins/ directory. Then, try download new version and install as usual.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Installation

  1. Upload the kn-mobile-sharebar folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the KN Mobile ShareBar plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Change KN Mobile Sharebar settings in admin panel and then continue view your site via mobile!

Updating

If you had a trouble in updating this plugin, try deactive old version and delete the folder kn-mobile-sharebar from the /wp-content/plugins/ directory. Then, try download new version and install as usual.

Can I customize text to share?

  • Yes, sure! Check KN Mobile ShareBar setting in your admin panel.

Can I ask another question?

  • Contact me then freddie[at]kakinetwork[dot]com
sections.changelog:
1.1.2 – 28 September 2017

  • Fix : Some function which is not working.

1.1.1 – 31 July 2017

  • Fix : Some function which is not working.

1.1.0 – 19 July 2017

  • Fix : Some error and php warning.
  • Update : WhatsApp api.

1.0.9 – 26 February 2014

  • Fix : Repair whatsapp & twitter share error for same case.

1.0.8 – 26 February 2014

  • New : Option to appear on small size desktop browser.
  • New : Option to change ShareBar height size.
  • New : Option to place ShareBar location at bottom or top of the page.
  • New : Option to show or hide ShareBar at front page, every blog post or every page.
  • New : Twitter and WhatsApp text can be modified.
  • Fix : Repair whatsapp share error for same case.
  • Fix : Will not appear on small size desktop browser.

1.0.1 – 25 February 2014

  • New : First release.
